import Head from "next/head" import { Fragment, useState } from "react" import Footer from "./footer" import Header from "./header" import useSwr from "swr" import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux" import axios from "axios"; import Image from "next/image" import { GetPriceHtml } from "./helpers" import Link from "next/link" import CartButton from "../components/cartButon" export default function Cart() { const config = useSelector(state => state.config) const dispatch = useDispatch() const [reload, setReload] = useState(1) const fetcher = async (url) => await axios.get(url).then(res => res.data) let cartProductDetails = [] if (config.cart) { for (let ci of config.cart) { let { data } = useSwr(`${process.env.API_URL}products/${ci.slug}`, fetcher, { revalidateOnFocus: false }) if (data) { data.quantity = ci.quantity cartProductDetails = [...cartProductDetails, ...[data]] } } } const removeFromCart = (pid) => { setReload(reload + 1) if(config.cart){ let filteredCart = config.cart.filter(c => c.id !== pid) } } return ( Cart Details

{cartProductDetails.length} Items in your bag

{ cartProductDetails.map((cp) => { return (

{cp.name}
removeFromCart(cp.id)} class="fa fa-trash" aria-hidden="true">

) }) }

Apply Coupon

Appy

Price Details

Bag Total USD 8998.00
tax USD 798.57
Delivery Charges USD 250.00
Total USD 9796.57
) }
